name: JohannesTalk
_source: s;Simon;Johannes, what do you think about all of this?
s;Johannes;It sure seemed like a trap to me.|I mean, Lord Morrissey had left far in advance.|Is it really more complicated than that?
s;Simon;It's just hard to believe.|We've been allies for so long.
s;Johannes;Maybe.{w} Or maybe he's just been using you.|Either way, you're the boss, Simon.|I'll follow your lead.
